title: Validate file references
description: Validate all file path references across Power Query template documentation and command files. Ensure references from CLAUDE.md, README.md, template_overview10.md all point to correct locations in templates/power-query/ structure. Fix any broken links.
notes:
Fixed all broken file path references. Issue: documentation referenced context/standards/ subdirectory that doesn't exist. Files (power-query.md, naming.md, error-handling.md, critical_rules.md) are directly in context/ directory. Updated 7 files:
1. template_overview10.md - Fixed Power Query template structure
2. templates/power-query/SETUP-GUIDE.md - Fixed directory tree
3. templates/power-query/FILE-MANIFEST.md - Fixed section headers (3 edits)
4. templates/power-query/CLAUDE-template.md - Fixed key context files list
5. templates/power-query/QUICKSTART.md - Fixed directory tree
6. templates/power-query/STRUCTURE.md - Fixed directory tree
7. templates/power-query/commands/complete-task.md - Fixed context loading list
All references now point to correct locations in templates/power-query/ structure.
